sentences.english: If chance, by lonely contemplation led.
sentences.chinese: 假如在幽思的引导下，偶然有缘分。

sentences.english: She came across a pile of old photographs while she was clearing the attic.
sentences.chinese: 她打扫阁楼时偶然发现了一沓旧照片。

sentences.english: Lily runs into her in the stairwell one day.
sentences.chinese: 一天，李莉在楼梯间偶然碰到新拌进来的女孩。

sentences.english: This handkerchief belonged to the old gentleman, who had simply let it fall from his pocket.
sentences.chinese: 这手帕原是那老先生的，偶然从他衣袋里掉出来罢了。

sentences.english: How else to explain those wacky, way-out-in-left-field roadside attractions you'll stumble upon?
sentences.chinese: 否则怎么解释你偶然遇到的出现在路左边的景点？

sentences.english: A occasional chance, He a guns second-hand resell to commons armed force army.
sentences.chinese: 一个偶然的机会，他把枪支转手倒卖给民间武装军队。

sentences.english: I like the unintentional positive outcomes of the kind occasionally.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢无心插柳柳成荫的那种偶然。

sentences.english: Without it. life will be empty and meaningless.
sentences.chinese: 没有它，人生将是朴陋的而且毫偶然义的。

sentences.english: I discovered the fossil quite by accident.
sentences.chinese: 我发现这块化石纯属偶然。

sentences.english: We are the casual acquaintance of a long railway journey.
sentences.chinese: 我们是在火车长途旅行中偶然结识的朋友。

sentences.english: Some are asymptomatic and discovered as an incidental radiologic finding.
sentences.chinese: 这些病人仅在偶然的放射线检查时才被发现。

sentences.english: The accident was the preface to a great scientific discovery.
sentences.chinese: 这一偶然事务成了一项重大科学发明的前奏。

sentences.english: It was an accident pure and simple.
sentences.chinese: 这完全是一桩偶然事故。

sentences.english: I chanced on a copy of the collection of Shakespeare's poems in the library.
sentences.chinese: 我在图书馆中偶然发现了一本莎士比亚诗集。

definition: inadvertent/accidental/to have no intention of (doing sth)
just by chance/to happen to (just at the right time)/opportune
to be prompted by a sudden impulse/carried away by a whim/to have a brainstorm
meet by chance/have a chance encounter
